mapper.select: select ,p.c_permisName,r.c_roleName,a.c_createDate,a.c_updateDate from sys_role_permission a left join sys_permission p on p.id = a.n_permisId left join sys_roles r on r.id = a.n_roleId where a.n_deleted = 0 order by id limit #{page.index},#{page.rows}
select count(id) from sys_role_permission where n_deleted = 0
